basics.name: Martin Henke
basics.label: Coastal Engineer
basics.summary: A coastal scientist/engineer with a passion for understanding coastal processes and mitigating associated hazards and impacts on coastal communities. Experienced in numerical modeling, data analysis, and fieldwork.

work.name: Coastal Science Division, Pacific Northwest National Laboratory
work.summary: Conducting research on coastal dynamics, waves, marine energy in high-latitude and Arctic environments using numerical models.

volunteer.summary: Taught math and physics to secondary school students in a rural community and organized workshops promoting women's access to education.
